donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Support to the implementation of the National Human Rights Action Plan (NHRAP) aims to assist the Government of the United Republic of Tanzania in the implementation of the action plan, through the establishment of a transparent and robust monitoring human rights system. The main area of support will focus on building capacity of key government agencies, and harness relationships with Civil Society Organizations and other stakeholders for a comprehensive and effective monitoring architecture in Tanzania. UNDP is particularly committed to supporting the Commission for Human Rights and Good Governance as their role in monitoring and building awareness on the plan, and to provide technical expertise where necessary. 

The main objectives of this project include;
• The inculcating of a culture and concrete awareness of human rights and the National Human Rights Action Plan by citizens. 
• Promote a responsive and accessible justice system that promotes human rights, social inclusion and rule of law developed. 
• Facilitate skills building in National Human Rights institutions for effective monitoring of the National Human Rights Action Plan 
• The mainstreaming of the human rights based approach into key government functions and institutions.

project_title: Institutional support-National Human Rights Action Plan
